data.title: [tolua]Lua bindings-generator support android-ndk-r9d android-ndk-r10d android-ndk-r10e
data.body:
[tolua]Lua bindings-generator support android-ndk-r9d android-ndk-r10d android-ndk-r10e
(win32 support  android-ndk-r9d android-ndk-r10d android-ndk-r10e android-ndk-r11c android-ndk-r13b android-ndk-r14b)

data.title: AVAudioSessionInterruptionNotification not fired caused by CDAudioManager set AVAudioSession's delegate
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.x
- devices test on:  运行 iOS 9.x and 10.x的几个设备
- developing environments
   - Xcode version: 8.3.2 and 8.2.x

### 问题原因:

* AVAudioSessionDelegate 已经被标记为 deprecated 但是 CDAudioManager  仍在使用这个东西。
* 在CDAudioManager::init方法里，给AVAudioSessionManager的单例对象设置了delegate 从而导致系统的其他原生模块注册的通知观察者不可用了。
* 我的app有一个虚拟的MIDI发生设备用来模拟钢琴键盘。播放midi文件的时候闹铃响起，但是因为上述原因导致无法收到音频中断，从而无法恢复播放状态。

### 修改办法:

将 **[AVAudioSession sharedInstance].delegate = xxx** 这行，改为：
```
[[NSNotificationCenter defaultCenter] addObserver:obj selector:@selector(xxx:) name:AVAudioSessionInterruptionNotification object:[AVAudioSession sharedInstance]];
```

data.title: xcrun: error: unable to find utility "PackageApplication", not a developer tool or in PATH
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.14.1
- devices test on: mac
- developing environments
   - NDK version:
   - Xcode version:
   - VS version:
   - browser type and version:

Steps to Reproduce:

1.  Run cocos console : cocos compile -p ios -m release -j4 --sign-identity "iPhone Developer"
2. Get the error: cocos compile -p ios -m release -j4 --sign-identity "iPhone Developer"

data.title: 同步主线V3.15的修改
data.body: 哈哈！虽然是自己提交过去的

data.title: Memory leak in setFontAtlas, if set equal font in Label.
data.body:
setCharMap, setBMFontFilePath and setTTFConfigInternal use getFontAtlas.
getFontAtlas retain font atlas always.
setFontAtlas not release, if atlas equal current.

For example call Label::setTTFConfig for equal ttfConfig.

data.title: ProgressTimer Bug on move parent
[UI] Label shadow with blur
data.body:
Hi,
It looks like `Label::enableShadow()` method accepts `blurRadius` parameter to adjust shadow blur strength.
But there is no implementation for now and this parameter is just suppressed in `CCLabel.cpp`.
Is there any news on this topic?

data.title: iOS: SimpleAudioEngine will not play .ogg files after migrating 3.6->3.15
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.15
- devices test on: iPhone 5, Simulator, Google Pixel
- developing environments
   - Xcode version: 8.3.2

I've migrated my game from 3.6 to 3.15 by simply to generate a new game project using 3.15 in order to get up-to-date base projects, then migrating my Resources and Classes across.  Apart from a minor update to my AppDelegate, I made no code changes.

This has been success in Android (yay Android Studio!), but iOS won't play any of my .ogg sound effects on an iPhone 5, 6 and the simulator.  I use SimpleAudioEngine.  Background music plays fine (mp3).  As a test, I replaced an effect with a .caf file and this played correctly.

Refactoring to use AudioEngine is not feasible: 1. mature game, 2. experimental bugs put me off, 3. variable pitch is not yet supported.

My usage:

1. My sound files are preloaded on launch: SimpleAudioEngine::getInstance()->preloadEffect(mySoundOggFile)
2. Playing music: engine->playBackgroundMusic(myMusicMp3File, true);
3. Sound effects: engine->playEffect(mySoundOggFile, !playOnce); 

As mentioned, .caf files appear to work fine.

Has some change been made between 3.6 and 3.15 that I need to handle now?

data.title: V3.15
data.body: I want to use this engine

data.title: fatal error: 'new' file not found #include <new> //for placement new
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.14.1 and 3.15
- devices test on: GNU/Linux and Clang as Compiler
- developing environments
   - NDK version: Not Relevant
   - Xcode version: Not Relevant
   - VS version: Not Relevant
   - browser type and version: Not Relevant

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Create a new C++ project
2. Try building it with Clang on GNU/Linux

```
$ uname -a
Linux babaei-pc 4.9.24 #44 SMP Tue Apr 25 20:57:42 IRDT 2017 x86_64 Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-2500K CPU @ 3.30GHz GenuineIntel GNU/Linux

$ clang --version
clang version 3.9.1 (tags/RELEASE_391/final)
Target: x86_64-pc-linux-gnu
Thread model: posix
InstalledDir: /usr/bin

$ g++ --version
g++ (Funtoo 5.3.0-r1) 5.3.0
Copyright (C) 2015 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
```

OK, when I try to build a newly created C++ project using Cocos2d-x 3.14.1 or 3.15 using LLVM/Clang on Funtoo Linux I'll get the following (though GCC is fine):

```
02:24:09: Running steps for project MyGame...
02:24:09: Starting: "/usr/bin/cmake" --build . --target all
```

fix bug (https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/issues/17746)

data.title: 【iOS】Keyboard events' deal cause screen confusion
HOW TO DELETE THIS?
Has Screenshot! How to apply color effect like FLASH in cocos2dx?
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version:3.10
I want to write a function to apply the same color effect (at below) in cocos2dx, but have no idea yet.
Can somebody give me a help~ THANKS!

![color_effect](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/848803/25369620/d6be9f6a-29b7-11e7-9dc7-8dfbed4d0a6a.png)

data.title: [iOS] Touch began event delayed with 3D Touch devices
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.13.1
- devices test on: iPhone 7 (3D Touch on)
- developing environments
   - Xcode version: 8.3.2

Steps to Reproduce:
1.  Build the project with the provided test source code
2. Put a finger in the red area without moving it (see the photo)
3. Observe that `touchBegan` is delayed respect to a touch in the white area

This is a problem especially with touch gestures like long press gesture recognizer.

![iphone 7 screen](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/19324622/25335115/e95eb2c0-28f1-11e7-8de8-a3e91fbea1f0.png)

Test code:
[Classes.zip](https://github.com/cocos2d/cocos2d-x/files/951521/Classes.zip)

data.title: G++ Compile Error With backslash
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: 3.15
- devices test on: none
- developing environments
   - NDK version:
   - Xcode version:
   - VS version:2015
   - browser type and version:

1.  typing cocos compile -p android
...
...
when compile libmygame.so
arm-linux-androideabi -g++: error: E:testcocos2dexternal/xxx/xxx/xxx/xxx.a No Such file or dir

data.title: [cpp-tests]Fix Box2DTestBed keyboard error!
data.body:
[cpp-tests]Fix Box2DTestBed keyboard error!

修复cpp-tests中的Box2DTestBed用例不响应键盘事件问题！

data.title: experimental::AudioEngine cannot play .OGG files in Mac
data.body:
- cocos2d-x version: v3.15, official release
- devices test on:
- developing environments
   - Xcode version: 8.2

Steps to Reproduce:

1. Try playing an `.ogg` audio file with  `experimental::AudioEngine::play2d`, there will be no sound.

data.title: Android custom event issue: userData is empty
Fix Box2DTestBed keyboard error!
data.body:
Fix Box2DTestBed keyboard error!

data.title: fix ios label shrink overflow clamp letters issue
JSB SocketIO.connect supports to pass a CA cert file
Avoid crash on large file download.
data.body:
Downloading large file to memory could cause stack overflow and crash, because old code created buffer `char buf[buflen];` on stack.
New code creates buffer in heap.
